name: Spi
description:
Spi is about dealing with a space spiders infestation. Energy keeps you alive and kills enemies. It can be drained from dead space spiders and Boxes. Boxes. They can be moved around, onto buttons, which close and open doors. Shoot those spiders and balance your energy!

Spi was made by Joeri Ridder and Ezra Frankema in 48 hours for the GMTK-jam 2017
